function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Sharing verified health and location information among individuals, authorities, and hospitals","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gis data for covid-19 mapping","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Bluetooth contact tracing for covid-19","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of contact tracing data ","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of bluetooth for tracking covid-19 spread","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of gps for monitoring covid-19 positive patients","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The app may not accurately determine whether an individual has been exposed to a potential covid-19 patient, leading to false alerts or a lack of necessary alerts","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns surrounding the use of gps technology could lead to public distrust and reluctance to use the app","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to data collection and usage by the contact tracing app","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False sense of security provided by the voice-detection app for covid-19 screening","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Voice-based covid-19 diagnosis app may not be accurate or reliable","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disease surveillance and forecasting","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for disease prediction without human interpretation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on ai for risk estimation of emerging infections","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on technology for early identification of zoonotic viruses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prediction of risk of infection, severe symptoms, and treatment outcomes using ai","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai predictive models may have accuracy limitations and may not always provide accurate predictions for severe cases of covid-19.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repurposing of ai tools for covid-19 screening and diagnosis may lead to errors and inaccuracies in test results.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-based multisensory technology for covid-19 screening may raise privacy and data security concerns for individuals being scanned.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of thermal face scans and ai-enabled cameras for temperature screening","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai-enabled medical imaging for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of unbiased data affecting ai model performance","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of medical equipment during use of medical imaging techniques","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Acceleration of testing kit development using ai","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential false positive or false negative results in covid-19 screening due to voice detection technology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for accurate diagnosis of covid-19 mutations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"False identification of potential drug treatments for covid-19 through ai analysis.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery for contagious diseases without thorough validation and testing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repurposing existing drugs without sufficient evidence for effectiveness against covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of ai-created drugs without comprehensive understanding of potential side effects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed availability of treatments due to extensive scientific checks and clinical trials","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai-driven drug discovery","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus binding to host cells via lock and key mechanism","category":"Biological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures","category":"Biological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and machine learning for modeling virus structures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unidentified mammalian host for sars-cov-2 transmission to humans","category":"Biological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Propagation of fake news and misinformation related to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai for enforcing social distancing and lockdown measures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges with ai models due to lack of historical data and noisy data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai systems assuming all contingencies are the same as those in the training dataset, leading to inaccurate decision-making","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns associated with the use of ai for crowd surveillance, leading to fear and distrust among the public","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
